title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 149.6 - Applicaton of performance evaluation procedures to employees in nongraded positions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 149.6 - Applicaton of performance evaluation procedures to employees in nongraded positions

State Regulations
(a) Employees in the Security Services Negotiating Unit in positions not allocated
to a salary grade are eligible for performance advancement payments in a manner
similar to persons in graded positions in this same negotiating unit if the
positions of such employees are equated to a salary grade by the Director of
the Budget. (b) Employees serving
in nongraded trainee positions shall be eligible for performance advancement
payments in accordance with the terms of plans developed by the Director of

Classification and Compensation and approved by the Director of the

Budget. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
149.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
